content: this text summarizes the progress of a divorce case between mr em and ms ea it explains a legal procedure called statement liquidation distribution cost procedure involving a sum of €1152368 the procedure lasted for 1 year and 11 days the notary reminds the parties about the bailiffs writ and the registered letter inspecting the statement of liquidation and distribution the parties have been given a formal notice to raise any objections or agreements regarding the statement a drawing of lots will take place in the presence or absence of the parties and any disputes or difficulties will be recorded the text provides details about the preliminary procedure dissolution of matrimonial property children assets claims and costs the net assets will be allocated to each party according to the courts approval the text concludes with an attachment of a proposed distribution overview the notary reminds the parties to review the bailiffs writ and raise any objections within one month a drawing of lots will take place and if there are no disputes the statement becomes final and can be approved by the court once approved joint ownership ceases to exist and the parties no longer have any claims or rights the notary states that the statement is closed and signs the document
